hero.name:
Mauricio
G. Olagaray
hero.title: Web developer passionate about creating functional and engaging digital experiences.
hero.description: I am a web developer with an analytical and creative mindset, passionate about building applications that solve real problems and improve people's lives. My approach combines technology, intuitive design, and code efficiency.

about.introduction: My background in Finance gave me a strong analytical foundation, but I found my true passion in technology. Now, I combine both worlds to develop efficient digital solutions, focusing on data and process optimization.
about.personal: Outside of coding, I enjoy calisthenics, yoga, and exploring nature—activities that help me maintain a balance between mind and body. My goal is to continue growing as a developer, creating innovative projects, and one day working at Google to take my skills to the next level.

entries.title: Beyond Code ✨
entries.description: Becoming part of Google. Global impact. Balancing my professional life with my passions.

entries.title: Preparing for the Next Level 🚀
entries.description: Developing freelance and personal projects. Perfecting technologies. Continuing to learn and improve.

entries.title: Deep Dive into Web Development 🌐
entries.description: I discover my passion: programming and product development. Freelance work at On-running in software implementation. Internship at BMW Group in digital solutions. Frontend and Backend development in personal applications.

entries.title: Discovering Programming 🔍
entries.description: As a developer at Disfruta, I created systems for product management, orders, and logistics. Developed financial management and control systems.

entries.title: Finance and Business 💼
entries.description: Experience at Gabrica, Keller Williams, and Ziel (investment fund), acquiring skills in analysis, management, and communication. Bachelor's degree in Finance and Public Accounting from Universidad Anáhuac. 🎓 Experience in analytics and business problem-solving.

entries.title: German School 🇩🇪
entries.description: International education. Development of discipline and a global vision.

title: Beyond Code ✨
A Future Full of Possibilities
description: My goal is to become part of Google and contribute to an international team that combines creativity and technology. I aspire to develop solutions that positively impact people while maintaining a balance between my professional life and my passions such as yoga, meditation, and calisthenics.
Every step I take brings me closer to that goal. This is just the beginning.

title: Preparing for the Next Level 🚀
Expanding My Horizons
description: I am currently developing personal and third-party projects. I seek optimal solutions to problems using TypeScript, Go, and Swift. I continue exploring new technologies and updates to stay at the forefront.

title: Immersion in Web Development 🌐
A New Technical Beginning
description: During this period, I fully immersed myself in web development, mastering technologies such as Next.js, Angular, TypeScript, and Go. As part of my growth, I created a personal finance application, combining my financial knowledge with my technical skills.

Additionally, I had the opportunity to gain practical experience in the tech industry: Freelance at On-running: Developing innovative digital solutions. Internship at BMW Group: Implementing technological tools to optimize business processes.

title: Discovering Programming 🔍
The Moment of Change
description: While working as an Accounting Assistant at Angel Venture, I discovered how programming could automate processes and simplify repetitive tasks. This discovery sparked my curiosity and led me to explore the world of development.

Later, in my role as a Developer at Disfruta, I created web systems to optimize product catalog management, orders, and logistics. This experience allowed me to connect my finance background with the potential of technology.

title: My Path in Finance and Business 💼
Experience in Various Fields
description: My journey in the financial world provided me with key skills in analysis, management, and communication: General Assistant at Gabrica: Supervision of financial transactions and budget analysis. Real Estate Advisor at Keller Williams: Developing customized strategies for clients and creating innovative visual materials. Founder of Ziel: Managing an investment fund, risk analysis, and effective communication with clients in a dynamic environment.

title: Degree in Finance and Public Accounting 🎓
Exploring the Financial World
description: While studying at Universidad Anáhuac, I developed a strong interest in data and financial structure. These years provided me not only with technical knowledge but also analytical skills to solve complex business problems.

title: Graduation from the German School 🇩🇪
An International Beginning
description: My education at German School gave me a global mindset and a solid foundation in discipline and organization—key elements that have guided my academic and professional journey.
This journey is just beginning. With each challenge, I get closer to my goal: combining creativity, technology, and strategy to make an impact in the world. 🚀✨

entries.name: Tiny Piano
entries.description: A small interactive piano that allows playing sounds by clicking on the keys.
learnings: 🎹 Creating interactive elements using JavaScript events.
🎹 Using CSS to customize a visually appealing design.
🎹 Manipulating the DOM to integrate interactivity.

entries.name: Quote Image
entries.description: A web page that generates motivational images with random quotes. Implemented with React for a dynamic interface.
learnings: 📜 Using React to create reusable components.
📜 Generating dynamic content from data arrays.
📜 Creating automatic downloads for images generated in the browser.

entries.name: Garage Sale
entries.description: A web page designed to display the remaining items from a garage sale. Built with Astro for optimized performance.
learnings: 💸 Using Astro to build fast and lightweight pages.
💸 Optimizing interfaces for dynamic lists.
💸 Responsive design for mobile-friendly experiences.

entries.name: CSS Daily Challenge
entries.description: A collection of daily CSS challenges, created using HTML, CSS, and JavaScript. The challenges were organized in a site built with Astro.
learnings: 📆 Improving design skills with CSS, including animations and complex layouts.
📆 Solving small web development challenges.
📆 Organizing multiple projects into a central platform.

entries.name: Go Daily Challenge
entries.description: Challenges focused on the Go programming language to solve problems and build small projects.
learnings: 📆 Understanding basic and advanced concepts of the Go language.
📆 Structuring small projects and their scalability.
📆 Using Go to handle concurrency and efficient operations.

entries.name: Personal Finance Project
entries.description: An application to manage personal finances, developed with Next.js and Tailwind CSS.
learnings: 🏦 Integrating Tailwind for fast responsive styling.
🏦 Using Next.js for building server-side applications.
🏦 Designing data structures to handle categories, accounts, and financial events.

entries.name: Life Mapper
entries.description: A mobile application to log daily events with customizable categories and habits. Developed in Swift for iOS with a Go backend.
learnings: 🧭 Implementing databases to synchronize information between client and server.
🧭 Using Swift to develop a native and smooth user interface.
🧭 Designing RESTful APIs with Go to efficiently manage data.

entries.name: Angular Daily Challenge
entries.description: A series of small challenges to learn Angular, focusing on component usage, services, and state management.
learnings: 📆 Initial setup of Angular projects and CLI management.
📆 Creating dynamic and interactive components.
📆 Using services to handle data and events between components.

footer.quote: Never stop learning because technology never stops evolving.
footer.copyright: © 2025 Mauricio G. Olagaray. All rights reserved.
